short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browse the internet with contextual city statistics

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See stats on crime and fatal police shootings.

As you browse the internet, Orange will highlight US cities.  Hover to see statistics on crime (such as property crime, robbery, etc) and fatal shootings by on-duty police officers.

We hope that Orange allows you to more consciously learn about police brutality and browse the web with contextual information!

Crime data from the FBI. Fatal shootings data from the Washington Post.
